patthana1.20:1.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:1.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:2.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā— anāgatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:3.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—paccuppannārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:3.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:4.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā …
patthana1.20:7.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:7.1_3: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana1.20:8.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā— ahetukaṁ anāgatārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca tayo khandhā …pe…
patthana1.20:8.1_2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

patthana1.20:11.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā— arūpe atītārammaṇaṁ ekaṁ khandhaṁ paṭicca …pe…

patthana1.20:14.1_0: Atītārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca atītārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati napacchājātapaccayā …
patthana1.20:15.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anāgatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā—anāgatārammaṇe khandhe paṭicca anāgatārammaṇā cetanā.

patthana1.20:26.1_0: Nahetupaccayā ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… (sabbattha tīṇi) avigate tīṇi. (Evaṁ gaṇetabbaṁ.)
patthana1.20:29.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— atītārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:29.1_1: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe atītārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:30.1_0: Anāgatārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo— anāgatārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:31.1_0: Paccuppannārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo—paccuppannārammaṇā hetū
patthana1.20:31.1_2: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe paccuppannārammaṇā hetū sampayuttakānaṁ khandhānaṁ hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana1.20:32.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo atītārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— atītaṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati,
patthana1.20:32.1_9: Atītārammaṇe atīte khandhe aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassati,
patthana1.20:33.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo anāgatārammaṇassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo— anāgataṁ viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ paccavekkhati,

patthana1.20:50.1_0: Atītārammaṇo dhammo paccuppannārammaṇassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo— atītārammaṇaṁ cuticittaṁ
